ygData.subject: Warning
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve had two emails forged showing me as the sender.  Until I reason out what is going on, do not open emails from me unless I let you know that one is coming.

I've had two emails forged showing me as the sender.  Until I reason 
out what is going on, do not open emails from me unless I let you know 
that one is coming.  I'll alert everybody when this problem is solved.
